name: Roberts Clear Hot Melt Glue Sticks - Pack of 12
description: Roberts Glue Sticks for Hot Melt Glue Guns are 1/2 in. in diameter and fit most glue guns. These general-purpose glue sticks are also excellent for most carpet and sheetgoods, excluding vinyl backs. Roberts Glue Sticks help make repairs disappear with translucent hot melt glue that cools almost clear.1/2 in. Dia. hot melt glue sticks fit most glue gunsTranslucent glue sticks make repairs almost invisibleDesigned to cool to almost clearConvenient package of 12 sticksHigh purity allows glue to flow smoothly
